subject: RE: [junit] XML tree assertion
msgSnippet: Hi Vladimir, Have you checked XMLUnit: http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/? -Vincent ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
messageBody:
Hi Vladimir,

Have you checked XMLUnit: http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/?

-Vincent

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vladimir R. Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@...]
> Sent: 24 February 2003 16:32
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] XML tree assertion
>
> Just would like to know if anyone has already developed an assertion
> class to test two DOM trees and willing to see it added to the
> junit-addons library.
>
> -Vladimir
